SELECT
FROM trains.train_live_playback a LEFT JOIN trains.train_live_audit d ON a.auditId=d.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict c ON c.`value`=b.user_type WHERE c.type='sys_user_type' and a.id=#{id}
